channel.title: PS3 'Hacked' with PS Jailbreak
channel.description:
Got word of this today, this is only a day old se we'll have to wait to see how it all pans out, but so far, things looks pretty good for a legit PS3 mod. [quote] PS Jailbreak is a USB plug and play solution that installs in seconds, keeping your valid warranty seal in tact.
Easy to use installer and GUI takes you step by step.
Compatible with all production models FAT and SLIM. Supports all regions: USA, JAP, PAL and KOREA
PS Jailbreak disables forced software updates and will never brick your console.
Supports all games (it does not allow backups of bluray movies , dvd movies , or past consoles games)
Backup games to your internal hard drive or external hard drive through USB, and boot directly off GUI. Eliminating the need for expensive blueray burners and costly blank media.
Play backups off your hard drives 2x as fast as off the blueray drive. This eliminates lags and glitches to provide you with smoother game play.
Open up your console to a new generation of homebrew applications. Load homebrew apps/games off any USB hard drive/flash drive.
Fully updatable with new features/updates by connecting PS Jailbreak to any computers USB port. [/quote] [url]https://psx-scene.com/forums/showthread.php?t=64935[/url]

item.title: PS3 'Hacked' with PS Jailbreak
item.dc:creator: tigeredwards
item.description:
I received the original PS Jaiblreak ordered from https://www.gadget-asia.com. It works very well with my PS3, whose firmware stays as 3.41. I have backed up several favorite games to the HDD. We also received emails from them saying the producers had been working to upgrade the mod chip. It seems to be compatible with 3.42 and 3.5, but I’m worried to try it, so I keep the firmware as 3.41". Hope it will be upgraded soon.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 'Hacked' with PS Jailbreak
item.dc:creator: tigeredwards
item.description:
I got the email from Gadget Asia today. They have begun to dispatch the original PS Jailbreak. Cheers!!!

Dear Customer,

The psjailbreak has arrived! First, we would like to apologize for the delay. We would like to thank for your understanding that it was the distributor who keep delay us.

We are sending this email to make sure you will receive it as soon as possible, please read the following carefully.

  1. For all customers who tell us you are willing to wait for this device, or not yet reply our previous email, you are the first batch of customer who will receive your order. Once you receive your tracking number, please wait 1-2 days until it works as the courier needs time to update. Please try NOT to send us email as our email has been overloaded.

  2. For customers chosen refund but now change your mind, please DO reply this email and quote your order ID, we will also arrange shipment immediately.

  3. For those customers who stays with a refund decision, please DO reply this email and quote your order ID for a refund. We will do that but please allow sometime.

https://www.gadget-asia.com

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 'Hacked' with PS Jailbreak
item.dc:creator: StOnE
item.description:
This is confirmed real by numerous legit mod stores/sites. There are also numerous videos up, specifically at ozmodchips.com. It is not simply just a USB stick, it is an encrypted USB dongle that is unreadable by a PC. It goes on sale to the public next week, so we’ll here much more info by then I’m sure. It only works on PS3 games and will not support PSOne or PS2 games. You can install games directly to an internal HDD or an external usb HDD. It basically turns your PS3 into dev mode allowing the backup manager app to run.

Read full topic
